text: Mumina kerala se'isakala loka, yisakale allaha arau te'omra raachulara prati bisbasa sthapana karae arau raachulara lagata kono samajika kamata ekatraita haâ€™le te'omra anumati noloraakai guci nayaya; niscaya yisakale tomara paraa anumati bicarae kerala te'omloke'i allaha arau te'omra raachulara prati imana posana karae. Eteke te'omloke nijara kono kamara babe tomara ocarata anumati bicaraile te'omlokara majara yaka iccha tumi taka anumati pradana karaiba arau te'omlokara babe allahara ocarata ksama praarthana karaiba. Niscaya allaha parama ksamasila, parama dayalu
